trans-unit.source: Implements one row in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Implementa uma linha num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Grid items represent the hierarchy of the view into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Itens de grelha representam a hierarquia da vista para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can use a GridItem to obtain information about the grid's state and contents.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar um GridItem para obter informações sobre o estado e o conteúdo da grelha.

trans-unit.source: GridItem objects should not be cached because they represent a snapshot of the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> at the time they are accessed, and grid activity might dispose them.
trans-unit.target: GridItem objetos devem não ser colocados em cache porque que representam um instantâneo do Estado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>no momento em que são acedidos e atividade de grelha pode eliminá-los.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> often recreates GridItem objects internally without changing the view to the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>frequentemente recria internamente GridItem objetos sem alterar a vista para o utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the specified property is expandable to show nested properties.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se a propriedade especificada é possível expandir para mostrar propriedades aninhadas.

trans-unit.source: If a property is expandable, a plus (+) sign is displayed by the property name in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é expansível, um mais (+) início de sessão é apresentado pelo nome de propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: If the plus sign is clicked and no nested properties are available, the plus sign is then removed.
trans-unit.target: Se o sinal de adição é clicado e não existem propriedades aninhadas estão disponíveis, o sinal de adição, em seguida, é removido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified property can be expanded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a propriedade especificada pode ser expandida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is false.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é falsa.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> is in an expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref> está num estado expandido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: The Expanded property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, but a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> is not expandable.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de Expanded foi definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, mas um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref> não é possível expandir.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> objects, if any, associated as a child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém a coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref> objetos, se existirem, associado como elemento subordinado deste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o tipo deste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>, you must also ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A> has a valid value.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>, também tem de garantir que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A>tem um valor válido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName> the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.Parent%2A> property must be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.Parent%2A>propriedade tem de ser `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the text of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o texto deste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class gets the text that displays in the left column of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe obtém o texto que é apresentada na coluna esquerda da grelha.

trans-unit.source: The text retrieved can be different from the actual property name of the property represented by this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>.
trans-unit.target: O texto obtido pode ser diferente do nome verdadeiro da propriedade da propriedade representado por este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>

trans-unit.source: You can get the name for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName> by retrieving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A> and checking its <xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter o nome de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>obtendo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A>e a verificar o respetivo <xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor.Name%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the text associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o texto associado a este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref> deste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>, se aplicável.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.GridItemType%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>, this value will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.GridItemType%2A>para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>, este valor será `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.GridItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> representing the parent of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref> que representa o principal do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is only valid for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só é válida para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to retrieve information such as the property type of the grid item, the name of the grid item, or the type converter for the grid item.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para obter informações sobre como o tipo de propriedade do item de grelha, o nome do item de grelha ou o conversor de tipos para o item de grelha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, selects this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, seleciona esta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selection is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a seleção for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets user-defined data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados definidos pelo utilizador o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o valor atual desta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atual desta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
